title: Kylie Wins Christmas Song Contest
summary: Kylie Minogue has become the Christmas number one singer this year with her song called XMAS. She beat Wham!'s song Last Christmas, which was number one last year. Kylie is very happy and will celebrate by doing a jigsaw puzzle with her family in Australia. Her song is from a special album and was only on Amazon Music, which helped it get more plays. Experts say she worked hard to win, and it was a close race with other singers like Mariah Carey. This is a big achievement for Kylie because she is the first female singer to have number one songs in four different decades.

background_read: Christmas number one is a fun tradition in the UK where the most popular song during Christmas week is announced. Singers often try hard to win because it is a big honor. Kylie Minogue is a famous pop star who has been singing for many years and has many hit songs. This year, her new Christmas song became very popular, especially because it was easy to find on Amazon Music. She is celebrating with her family by doing a puzzle, which is a common holiday activity.
